pr_title: Add dropwizard metrics to track status of pods

timeline.message: Add dropwizard metrics to track status of pods

timeline.bodyText: Should be using requestMetricNameFor method on every call.
timeline.author: Vlatombe
Vlatombe

timeline.bodyText: Should be abstracting the key creation to a method such as requestMetricNameFor. No label here, but needs to be abstracted anyway.
timeline.author: Vlatombe

replies.bodyText:
Thanks for looking into this PR and your suggestions.
Many metric names are static, so I moved then to a separate class and made most of them constants. There are a few that depend on some params, I put them in methods as you suggested.
Let me know if it looks better now and if you have any concern.
replies.author: angry-cellophane

timeline.message: Move all metric names to one class to make easier to track their use

timeline.author: Vlatombe
